I'm your host, Darren Van Dam!

If you’ve been digging for underrated movie trilogies or trying to find the truly overlooked film series that slipped past even the most seasoned movie fans, this week’s list is going to hit you right in the sweet spot. I pulled together some of the best trilogies ever—the kind of hidden gem trilogies packed with cinematic filmmaking, bold style, and at least one movie you swear you’ve never even heard of. These aren’t your typical big-studio franchises; these are the criminally underrated trilogies that got overshadowed by louder blockbusters. Whether you love gritty neo-noir crime sagas, mind-bending sci-fi worlds, or character-driven stories that quietly punch you in the gut, this rund
title: 10 Most Underrated Movie Trilogies of All Time
